lead_paragraph: MANDEL--Joseph. The Palm Beach Country Club expresses its profound sorrow at the passing of its long standing and former member, Joseph Mandel, and extends sincere sympathy to his daughters Michele and husband Larry Beyer and Penni and husband Stephen Weinberg. Jeffrey B. Lane, President Warren Spector, Secretary 1/3
